awakened:RippedDoll.NAME: Ripped Doll
awakened:RippedDoll.FLAVOR: The last reminder of your prior self. It still holds latent magicks.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #yCeremony [REMOVE_SPACE].

awakened:ShreddedDoll.NAME: Shredded Doll
awakened:ShreddedDoll.FLAVOR: A reminder of your weakness, and yet you still can't let go.
DESCRIPTIONS: [REMOVE_SPACE].[] NL At the start of combat, gain #yCeremony+ [REMOVE_SPACE], and #b1 Ritual.

awakened:KTRibbon.NAME: Daemon's Ribbon
awakened:KTRibbon.FLAVOR: A conduit that grants power to spoken words.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you activate a #yawakened:Chant effect, gain #b
Block [REMOVE_SPACE]. Activates one #yawakened:Chant effect for free each turn.

awakened:TomeOfPortalmancy.NAME: Tome of Portalmancy
awakened:TomeOfPortalmancy.FLAVOR: A grimoire detailing the construction and maintenance of interplanar gates.

awakened:EyeOfTheOccult.NAME: Eye of the Occult
